bill.title: Mental health; bring forward statutes relating to.
bill.description: An Act To Bring Forward Sections 41-4-1 Through 41-4-9, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Relate To The State Department Of Mental Health, Sections 41-19-31 Through 41-19-43, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Relate To Regional Mental Health/intellectual Disability Commissions, Sections 41-21-61 Through 41-21-107, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Relate To Commitment Proceedings For Persons In Need Of Mental Treatment, And Sections 41-21-131 Through 41-21-143, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Relate To Mental Health Crisis Intervention Teams, For The Purposes Of Amendment; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Public Health and Human Services
